nodes.text: Nysad was one of many Kajain'sa'Nikto in the service of Jabba the Hutt. He was aboard the Khetanna at the Great Pit of Carkoon, and was killed in the ensuing fight between Jabba's forces and Luke Skywalker's allies during the Rescue of Han Solo in 4 ABY. Nysad fired a shot at Skywalker, but the Jedi rebounded it with his lightsaber, killing him.
